announcements.title: Scholarship Opportunity
announcements.content: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, we will be hosting a weekly contest. The top five winners from each contest will earn the chance to join the U-CAN Academy E-Learning Platform for free.
steps: Click on the Weekly Contest Card
announcements.closingMessage: Good luck, and may the best contestant win!
